reviews.review_msg: If you skip class there's literally nothing for you to work off of. No textbooks, no canvas modules, maybe just knowlege that you have an assignment due, and a bit of info about it via email. Despite that Anosh is a pretty good teacher. He's really caring and will help you get the grade you want, he just expects you to put in the work!

Anosh is hands down one of the best professors I've ever had. He has such a deep knowledge of his craft, and delivers it in the most inspiring and accessible way. He balances intensity with the occasional bit of humour, and is careful to remind us after an intense lecture or feedback session that we're learning, and that all we can do is our best.
